__e: If uprooting Trent is the price of justice, history will be on our side.
Can you remember what happened the night Judge Trent died?
Which means the reality of what he did to Judge Trent is probably hitting him.
I had Trent today, and you let him go to prove a point!
Listen, I don't what kind of ego trip you're on, but... Trent's real friends and family are out there, so you'll have to excuse me.
And just so you know -- all that stuff that she had the fake Trent say about the 3.4 GPA and the summers filing papers in my dad's law office, that's all true...about me.
